title: (x) Urban Outfitters: typewriter Avant Garde? - Avant Garde Mono {Nina}
content:
Hi guys,

spotted this on the ubranoutfitters webpage:

[http://www.urbanoutfitters.com/urban/emails/091109/sale-bg.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202113800/http:/www.urbanoutfitters.com/urban/emails/091109/sale-bg.gif "http://www.urbanoutfitters.com/urban/emails/091109/sale-bg.gif")

does anyone know what the "shop by price..." font is?

much appreciated!
author: ppk812
